msg
In the thousands of years of struggle against Houkai, countless outstanding groups and heroes have emerged.
在人类与崩坏长达数千年的斗争中，曾经涌现出无数杰出的群体与英雄。
人類と崩壊による数千年にも及ぶ戦いの中で、無数の優れた組織や英雄が現れてきた。
인류와 붕괴에 의한 수천 년에 걸친 전쟁 속에서, 무수한 훌륭한 조직과 영웅들이 나타났다.
In the thousands of years-long struggle between humanity and Honkai, countless outstanding groups and heroes had emerged.
In the thousands of years of warfare by mankind and Honkai, countless outstanding organizations and heroes have emerged.
msg
They might have made great achievements, or have saved the day.
他们可能创造过赫赫功勋，也可能力挽狂澜于既倒。
彼らは輝かしい功績を打ち立て、劣勢を挽回しようと倒れてきた——のかもしれない。
그들은 빛나는 공적을 세우고 열세를 만회하려다 쓰러진 ——일지도 모른다.
They may have created great feats, or they may have saved the day.
They have fallen to establish brilliant achievements and recover from inferiority - or maybe they have.
msg
However, their story in this long history only reduced to a supporting role to be forgotten.
然而他们的故事在这段漫长的历史中却只能沦为配角被人遗忘。
彼らの物語は、この長い歴史の中で脇役へと押しやられ、人々の記憶から忘れ去られてしまった。
그들의 이야기는 이 긴 역사 속에서 조연으로 밀려나 사람들의 기억에서 잊혀져 버렸다.
Yet their story has been relegated to a supporting role and forgotten in this long history.
Their stories have been pushed aside and forgotten from people's memories in this long history.
msg
Only one name has ever been heard in the history of mankind——
唯有一个名字永远响彻在人类的历史中——
ただ一つだけ、ある名前だけがずっと人類の歴史の中で輝き続けている——
오직 하나뿐인, 어떤 이름만이 계속 인류의 역사 속에서 빛나고 있어——
There is only one name that will always resonate in the history of mankind -
Only one name has shone throughout the history of mankind--the name of
msg
「Shicksal」
那就是「天命」。
それこそが「天命」。
그것이 바로 「천명」.
That's 'Schicksal'.
That is what "Schicksal" is all about.
msg
It has accumulated powerful technologies and historical materials to fight against Houkai, as well as the strongest fighting force of mankind.
沉淀着与崩坏抗争的强大技术与史料，同时也汇聚着人类最强的战力。
崩壊と戦うための強い技術と知識を蓄積し、そして人類最強の戦力を結集させている。
붕괴와 싸우기 위한 강력한 기술과 지식을 축적하고, 인류 최강의 전력을 결집시키고 있다.
It is steeped in the powerful technology and history of the fight against Honkai, as well as bringing together the strongest human combatants.
They have accumulated strong technology and knowledge to fight Honkai, and then they have assembled the strongest forces of mankind.
msg
Only Shicksal can overcome Houkai, and only Shicksal is the ultimate salvation of mankind!
只有天命才能战胜崩坏，也唯有天命才是人类最终的救赎！
天命だけが崩壊に勝つことができ、天命こそが人類の最後の救いである！
천명만이 붕괴에 이길 수 있고, 천명이 인류의 마지막 희망이다!
Only Honkai can overcome Schicksal, and only Honkai is the ultimate salvation of mankind!
Only Schicksal can prevail over Honkai, and Schicksal is the final salvation of humanity!
msg
And the other heresies who stand in the way of Shicksal, no matter who ends up with nothing but destruction…
而其他阻拦天命脚步的异端，不管是谁结局都只有灭亡……
そして、天命の歩みを阻もうとする異端者どもは、誰であろうと破滅の道しか残されていない……。
그리고 천명의 걸음을 막으려 하는 이단자들은, 누구라도 파멸의 길만이 남아있을 뿐이다…….
And other heretics who stand in the way of Schicksal's footsteps, no matter who they are, will only end up perishing ......
And those heretics who try to block the steps of Schicksal, no matter who they are, are left with nothing but destruction. ......

But…My Lord...Why do we continue to fight against humanity that our duty of providence to destroy Houkai? I can't understand…
可是…主教大人…天命的职责本该是消灭崩坏，为何我们一直在与人类战斗呢？我实在无法理解……
しかし、主教様……天命の役割は崩壊の消滅だったはず。#nどうして、私たちはずっと人間と戦い続けているの？理解できないわ……。
하지만, 주교님......천명의 역할은 붕괴의 소멸이었을 텐데.#n왜 우리는 계속 인간과 싸우고 있는 거죠? 이해할 수 없어요......

I know you're still lost inside, but standing in front of the flood of history, we must understand this truth. Not all human beings have the same idea, they are always different, always be swayed by considerations of gain and loss.
我知道你的内心还留有迷茫，但是站在历史的洪流前，我们必须明白这样的道理。并不是所有的人类都抱有同一个理念，他们总是各怀鬼胎，总是患得患失。
君の心にまだ迷いがあるのは分かっているよ。#nだけど、歴史の奔流を前に立つ僕たちは、必ず知っておかなければならないことがあるんだ。決して全ての人間が同じ理念を抱いているわけではなく、常にそれぞれの思惑を抱え、自分たちの損得を考えているということをね。
네 마음에 아직도 망설임이 있는 건 알고 있어.#n하지만 역사의 급류 앞에 선 우리들은 반드시 알아야 할 것이 있지. 결코 모든 인간이 같은 이념을 품고 있는 게 아니며, 항상 각자의 속셈을 품고 자신들의 이득을 계산한다는 것을 말이야.

I know that there is still confusion in your heart, but standing before the flood of history, we must understand this. Not all human beings have the same idea, they always have their own ideas, they always suffer.

I know you still have doubts in your mind. But as we stand in front of the torrent of history, there is something we must know. We must know that not all people have the same ideals, that they always have their own agendas and their own interests at heart.
msg
But in the face of such a disaster, if the human mind is still in such a state, the result will only be destroyed gradually.
但是在面对崩坏这样的灾难的时候，如果人类还抱有这样的心态，那么结果只会被崩坏逐渐蚕食而已。
けど、崩壊のような災いを前に、人類全員がそのような心持ちでいては、待っている結末は崩壊に飲み込まれるだけさ。
하지만 붕괴와 같은 재앙을 앞에 두고 인류 전체가 그런 마음가짐으로 있다면, 기다리고 있는 결말은 붕괴에 삼켜지는 것뿐이야.
But when faced with a catastrophe like Honkai, if mankind still holds such a mentality, then the result will only be gradually eaten away by Honkai.
But if all of humanity has such a mindset in the face of such a calamity as Honkai, the only outcome that awaits us is to be swallowed up by it.

To ensure the unity of human power...If we are not on the same side, we will have to use force to bring them to their knees. That way, at least, they won't get in the way.

In order to ensure the unity of human power...if they can't be on the same side, then they have to be brought to their knees by force, so that at least they won't become a stumbling block in Schicksal's path forward.
